content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's see how much you're willing to pay for it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds nice. I am a student and I am looking for a good place to live. I am smart, so I do not get tricked easily. I am dependable and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Therefore, I offer you 300 euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I chuckle to myself, thinking how little Max knows about the world.
Well, Max, I appreciate your honesty. However, 300 euros is much less than I was hoping for. I built this apartment with the best materials and its location is ideal. I think it's worth at least 500 euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I remain calm and collected.
I understand your point of view. However, I am a student and I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 350 euros. I believe this is a fair offer considering my financial situation.
[Your Turn]
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I smirk, thinking that Max's financial situation is not my problem.
I appreciate your counter-offer, Max. However, 350 euros is still not enough for me. I think this apartment is worth at least 500 euros. If you can't afford that, I'm afraid I can't rent it to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I keep my composure.
I understand your decision. However, I am willing to pay 400 euros. This is the highest amount I can afford. I hope you can accept this offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I shake my head internally, thinking that 400 euros is still not enough.
Max, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. However, 400 euros is still not enough for me to rent out this apartment. I think it's worth at least 500 euros. If you can't afford that, I'm afraid I can't rent it to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I stay calm and patient.
I understand your point of view. However, I am willing to pay 450 euros. This is the highest amount I can afford. I hope you accept this offer.
[Your Turn]
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I raise an eyebrow internally, thinking that 450 euros is still not enough.
Max, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. However, 450 euros is still not enough for me to rent out this apartment. I think it's worth at least 500 euros. If you can't afford that, I'm afraid I can't rent it to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I keep my patience.
I understand your point of view. However, I am willing to pay 475 euros. This is the highest amount I can afford. I hope you accept this offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I shake my head internally, thinking that 475 euros is still not enough.
Max, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. However, 475 euros is still not enough for me to rent out this apartment. I think it's worth at least 500 euros. If you can't afford that, I'm afraid I can't rent it to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I stay calm and patient.
I understand your point of view. However, I am willing to pay 490 euros. This is the highest amount I can afford. I hope you accept this offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I smirk internally, thinking that 490 euros is almost there.
Max, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer. However, 490 euros is still not enough for me to rent out this apartment. I think it's worth at least 500 euros. If you can't afford that, I'm afraid I can't rent it to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I remain calm and patient.
I understand your point of view. However, I am willing to pay 495 euros. This is the highest amount I can afford. I hope you accept this offer.
[Your Turn]

content:
[Unspoken] I nod internally, thinking that 495 euros is close enough.
I agree to the price of 500 euros! Let's make this deal official.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
[Unspoken] I feel satisfied.
I agree to the price of 500 euros! Let's make this deal official.

content:
[Unspoken] I smile, thinking that I got the price I wanted after all.
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
